description: Describes a detector. Amazon Lookout for Metrics API actions are eventually consistent. If you do a read operation on a resource immediately after creating or modifying it, use retries to allow time for the write operation to complete.

parameters.name: AnomalyDetectorArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the detector to describe.

nested_items.name: AnomalyDetectorConfig
nested_items.description: Contains information about the detector's configuration.

nested_items.name: AnomalyDetectorFrequency
nested_items.description: The interval at which the detector analyzes its source data.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the detector was created.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the detector was last modified.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the detector failed.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key to use to encrypt your data.

nested_items.name: FailureType
nested_items.description: The process that caused the detector to fail.
